title: taghudiyAna mana
sahitya:
taghudiyAna manap-pakkuvattilE tAnE varuvAn jnAnamanOharan


anupallavi

  vaghuppu vAda jAti bhEdam EnO vazhikkADum vIDu shezhippAgumO


caraNam    UrALum mannan uravu vENDinAl uLLa saTTa diTTam maruva vENDumE
pArALum parAparan shrIkaran bhakti jnAna karma citta shuddharukkut-
